name: clang-format
description: Use Clang-Format in Visual Studio Code

clang-format.style.default.title: Style
clang-format.style.default.description:
clang-format style.
(-style=value, value can be file, LLVM, Google, Chromium, Mozilla, WebKit or json configure)

clang-format.fallbackStyle.default.title: Fallback Style
clang-format.fallbackStyle.default.description:
clang-format fallback style.
(-fallback-style=value, value can be none, LLVM, Google, Chromium, Mozilla, WebKit)

clang-format.style.languages.description: Object with the key as LanguageId and value as a clang-format style.

clang-format.fallbackStyle.languages.description: Object with the key as LanguageId and value as a clang-format fallback style.

clang-format.enabledLanguageIds.description: Specify a list of languageIds to format.
clang-format.enabledLanguageIds.title: Enabled Language Ids

clang-format.assumeFilename.description:
When reading from stdin, clang-format assumes this filename to look for a style config file (with -style=file) and to determine the language.
The default value is the current filename being formated.

clang-format.additionalArguments.description: Additional arguments to pass to clang-format
